players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is the mafia. Diana is dead, and I investigated Alice last night. She's our only lead."
You: "Alice is not the mafia. Bob is trying to frame me without any proof. Why would I kill Diana when it only makes me the number one suspect?"
Charlie: "Alice's denial is expected, but Bob claims a private investigation result that can't be verified. We must be cautious and look for inconsistencies before rushing to accuse."
Charlie: "Alice and Bob are both accusing each other with no proof. We should watch their behavior closely today and vote based on who seems less trustworthy."
Bob: "Alice is the mafia. My investigation confirmed it. Diana is dead, and Alice is the only one who could have done it. Don't fall for her lies."

You: "Alice is not the mafia. Bob keeps repeating the same baseless claim without any proof. If Bob is honest, why not suggest investigating Charlie, who is suspiciously quiet and hesitant to take a side?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice is the mafia. Diana is dead, and I investigated Alice last night. She's our only lead."
Alice: "Alice is not the mafia. Bob is trying to frame me without any proof. Why would I kill Diana when it only makes me the number one suspect?"
Charlie: "Alice's denial is expected, but Bob claims a private investigation result that can't be verified. We must be cautious and look for inconsistencies before rushing to accuse."
Charlie: "Alice and Bob are both accusing each other with no proof. We should watch their behavior closely today and vote based on who seems less trustworthy."
You: "Alice is the mafia. My investigation confirmed it. Diana is dead, and Alice is the only one who could have done it. Don't fall for her lies."

Alice: "Alice is not the mafia. Bob keeps repeating the same baseless claim without any proof. If Bob is honest, why not suggest investigating Charlie, who is suspiciously quiet and hesitant to take a side?"
